title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water.
Beat the eggs and mix with Parmesan.
Drain the pasta and mix with bacon and egg mixture.
Serve with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice for 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
Prepare the sauce by simmering tomato sauce and cream.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
